TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComponentResourceKey extends System.Windows.ResourceKey

summary.span: 定义或引用基于外部程序集中的类名以及一个附加标识符的资源键。

span.span: Defines or references resource keys based on class names in external assemblies, as well as an additional identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 的信息，请参阅[ComponentResourceKey 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension). 此类实现的对象类型可用于创建基于程序集中的类型和标识符的键。This class implements an object type that is useful for creating keys that are based on types in assemblies plus an identifier. 由于你定义或引用了类型，因此你不需要请求特定的 ，并且程序集中可能存在多个资源集，每个资源集都按其 类型进行区分。Because you define or reference the type, you do not need to request a specific , and more than one set of resources can exist in the assembly, each differentiated by the type of their . 定义 有两种方法。There are two ways to define a . 如果需要易于访问的密钥，可以在控件类代码上定义一个静态属性，该属性将返回 ，该属性是在外部资源程序集中存在的 和 组成的。If you want an easily accessible key, you can define a static property on your control class code that returns a , constructed with a that exists in the external resource assembly, and a . 该键可用于为程序集中的控件定义其他默认样式，方法是为自定义控件交换原始外部资源程序集。The key can be used for defining alternate default styles for controls in an assembly, by swapping the original external resource assembly for a custom one. 您还可以在较大的控件样式或模板中定义一个命名资源部分以公开自定义入口点。You can also define a named resource part within a larger control style or template to expose a customization entry point. 如果要为控件定义主题资源字典，此方法特别有用。This is particularly useful if you are defining a theme resource dictionary for your control. 还可以直接在详细语法中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [ComponentResourceKey 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension)来创建密钥的松散实例。You can also use the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension) in verbose syntax directly to create a loose instance of the key. 如果要从其他程序集声明专用资源，而这些程序集的自定义性更少，则此方法非常有用。This is useful if you want to declare private resources from other assemblies that are less discoverable to customize.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不使用无参数构造函数，因为正确的初始化需要 值和 值。The parameterless constructor is not generally used, because a value and value are required for proper initialization. 无参数构造函数主要用于支持命名参数窗体中的[ComponentResourceKey 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension)XAML 用法。The parameterless constructor exists primarily to support [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension) XAML usage in named parameter form.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type typeInTargetAssembly, object resourceId) cil managed
Public Sub New (typeInTargetAssembly As Type, resourceId As Object)

span.span: The type that defines the resource key.

param.name: resourceId
param.span: 一个唯一标识符，用于将此 和其他与 类型关联的键区分开。

span.span: A unique identifier to differentiate this from others associated with the type.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定用于定义键的 以及用作附加资源标识符的对象。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a , specifying the that defines the key, and an object to use as an additional resource identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数存在于两个方案中，第一个方案最为重要：This constructor exist for two scenarios, with the first scenario being the most important: - 支持创建一个 ，然后将其作为自定义控件类上的公共静态字段公开。Supports creating a that is then exposed as a public static field on a custom control class. 这可以通过 `{x:Static}` 模板属性值的使用情况，简化控件对其在模板中定义的资源的访问。This simplifies a control's access to its own defined resources in the template through `{x:Static}` usages for template property values. - 支持位置参数窗体中的[ComponentResourceKey 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension)XAML 用法，这是一种可供引用组件资源的第三方使用的方法。Supports [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension) XAML usage in positional parameter form, which is one technique available for third parties that reference a component resource. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，然后将其作为控件类的静态键公开，以提供样式自定义入口点。The following example creates a that is then exposed as a static key of a control class to provide a style customization entry point. [!code-csharp[CorePseudocode#CRKCode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#crkcode)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#CRKCode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#crkcode)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个唯一标识符，以便将此键与该类型的其他关联键区分开。

span.span: Gets or sets a unique identifier to differentiate this key from others associated with this type.
A unique identifier.
Typically this is a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 的信息，请参阅[ComponentResourceKey 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension). 通常，用于 值的字符串符合[XamlName 语法](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar)。Typically, the string used for a value conforms to the [XamlName Grammar](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 将此密钥与此类型关联的其他项区分开来。The following example shows how to use the to differentiate this key from others associated with this type. [!code-xaml[ColorPicker_snip#SliderStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ColorPicker_snip/CSharp/ColorPickerLib/Themes/generic.xaml#sliderstyle)]

summary.span: 获取或设置定义资源键的 。

The type that defines the resource key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 的信息，请参阅[ComponentResourceKey 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension). 自定义组件使用 元素为基于包含类型的程序集的外部程序集访问的资源定义键。The element is used by custom components to define keys for resources that are accessed from external assemblies, based on targeting an assembly that contains the type. 自定义组件通常定义必须位于资源所在的程序集中的新类型。Custom components often define new types which must be in the assembly where the resource is located. 通常，这些类型没有其他实现，类型只是为了满足 的查找要求。Generally these types have no other implementation, the types only exist in order to satisfy the lookup requirements of a . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用[ComponentResourceKey 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension)定义 包括 和 。The following example shows how to define a including and using the [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension). 然后，可以将此资源放置在外部程序集中，并通过使用请求中的类似 请求资源的密钥使用来访问该资源。This resource can then be placed in an external assembly and accessed by a key usage that requests the resource using an analogous in the request. [!code-xaml[ColorPicker_snip#SliderStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ColorPicker_snip/CSharp/ColorPickerLib/Themes/generic.xaml#sliderstyle)]
